languages.text: "Возникли подозрения о ереси укрывательства священной десятины, поэтому была инициирована экстренная инспекция. Пока инспекция не подойдет к концу, десятина будет находиться в ведении Администратума на срок, составляющий 145 планетарных и 17 суточных циклов по хроноисчислению Даргонуса".

traits.locale_text: "Возникли подозрения о ереси укрывательства священной десятины, поэтому была инициирована экстренная инспекция. Пока инспекция не подойдет к концу, десятина будет находиться в ведении Администратума на срок, составляющий 145 планетарных и 17 суточных циклов по хроноисчислению Даргонуса".
traits.speaker: VC2_Prefect

languages.text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."
languages.original_text: "Возникли подозрения о ереси укрывательства священной десятины, поэтому была инициирована экстренная инспекция. Пока инспекция не подойдет к концу, десятина будет находиться в ведении Администратума на срок, составляющий 145 планетарных и 17 суточных циклов по хроноисчислению Даргонуса".

traits.locale_text: ""Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles, 17 solar cycles, and 2 full rotations according to Dargonus chronometry."

"Recently raised suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe have called for an urgent inspection. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the Administratum's custody. Estimated period: 143 Dargonus years, 17 days, 2 hours, and 3 minutes."

"Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

"Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

"Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum. Estimated retainment period: 143 Dargonus years, 17 days, 2 hours, and 3 minutes."

"Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum. Estimated retainment period: 143 Dargonus years, 17 days, 2 hours, and 3 minutes."

"Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum. Estimated retainment period: 143 Dargonus years, 17 days, 2 hours, and 3 minutes."

""Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles, 17 solar cycles, and 2 full rotations according to Dargonus chronometry."

languages.text: "Aufgrund des dringenden Verdachtes der Unterschlagung des heiligen Zehnts wurde eine dringliche Untersuchung wegen Ketzerei angestrengt. Bis zum Abschluss besagter Untersuchung bleibt der Zehnt für 145 Planetar- und 17 Solarzyklen gemäß der Chronometrie von Dargonus im Gewahrsam des Administratums.
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

traits.locale_text: "Aufgrund des dringenden Verdachtes der Unterschlagung des heiligen Zehnts wurde eine dringliche Untersuchung wegen Ketzerei angestrengt. Bis zum Abschluss besagter Untersuchung bleibt der Zehnt für 145 Planetar- und 17 Solarzyklen gemäß der Chronometrie von Dargonus im Gewahrsam des Administratums.

languages.text: « Nous avons dû procéder à une inspection d'urgence en raison de récents soupçons concernant la dissimulation hérétique de la dîme sacrée. Tant que cette procédure ne sera pas terminée, la dîme restera sous la garde de l'Administratum pour une durée de 145 cycles planétaires et 17 cycles solaires, selon la chronométrie de Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons dû procéder à une inspection d'urgence en raison de récents soupçons concernant la dissimulation hérétique de la dîme sacrée. Tant que cette procédure ne sera pas terminée, la dîme restera sous la garde de l'Administratum pour une durée de 145 cycles planétaires et 17 cycles solaires, selon la chronométrie de Dargonus. »

languages.text: “我们怀疑异端分子私藏了神圣的什一税，目前正在进行紧急检查。检查正式结束前，什一税将由内政部负责保管。根据达戈努斯计时法，预计扣押时间为145个行星周期零17个自转周期。”
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

traits.locale_text: “我们怀疑异端分子私藏了神圣的什一税，目前正在进行紧急检查。检查正式结束前，什一税将由内政部负责保管。根据达戈努斯计时法，预计扣押时间为145个行星周期零17个自转周期。”

languages.text: «Debido a las sospechas de herejía por ocultación del sagrado diezmo, se ha iniciado una inspección de emergencia. Hasta que termine la inspección, el diezmo permanecerá bajo custodia del Administratum durante un plazo de 145 años y 17 días según la cronometría de Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

traits.locale_text: «Debido a las sospechas de herejía por ocultación del sagrado diezmo, se ha iniciado una inspección de emergencia. Hasta que termine la inspección, el diezmo permanecerá bajo custodia del Administratum durante un plazo de 145 años y 17 días según la cronometría de Dargonus».

languages.text: 「最近、聖なる租税を横領した異端の疑いがあるため、緊急検査が開始されました。検査が完了するまで、租税は帝国行政局に保管されます。推定保管期間143ダルゴナス年、17日、2時間、3分」
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of appropriating the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum. Estimated retainment period: 143 Dargonus years, 17 days, 2 hours, and 3 minutes."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、聖なる租税を横領した異端の疑いがあるため、緊急検査が開始されました。検査が完了するまで、租税は帝国行政局に保管されます。推定保管期間143ダルゴナス年、17日、2時間、3分」

languages.text: "Kutsal aşarın saklanmasını amaçlayan bir kâfirliğe yönelik şüpheler nedeniyle acil bir teftiş başlatılmış bulunuyor. Söz konusu teftiş tamamlanana kadar aşar, Dargonus kronometresine göre 145 gezegen döngüsü ve 17 güneş döngüsü süresince Administratum'un nezaretinde kalacak."
languages.original_text: "Due to recent suspicions of the heresy of concealing the sacred tithe, an emergency inspection has been initiated. Until said inspection is complete, the tithe will remain in the custody of the Administratum for a term amounting to 145 planetary cycles and 17 solar cycles according to Dargonus chronometry."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal aşarın saklanmasını amaçlayan bir kâfirliğe yönelik şüpheler nedeniyle acil bir teftiş başlatılmış bulunuyor. Söz konusu teftiş tamamlanana kadar aşar, Dargonus kronometresine göre 145 gezegen döngüsü ve 17 güneş döngüsü süresince Administratum'un nezaretinde kalacak."
